channel.title: Help with a a few things
channel.description:
:confused: How do i enable teleports? (when i click them nothing happens) :confused: How do i make the character appearance screen pop up on the login? :confused: How do i stop the spam on my server? (Says things twice, Such as when you gain a level, it says it twice) :confused: How do i fix the leveling screen? (when i level, that screen comes up in the chat box, when i click, Click here to continue, it justs says please wait. (Until you Move or click)) :confused: How do i fix, when you die, it doesnt say, connection lost, please wait??
Helps Appriciated :)

@aydem22 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:2, topic:159604”]Second Problem: Search:

//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime);

Under it add:

showInterface(3559); [/quote]

i do not know where to fnd that code! i have looked forever and i cannot locate where it says that plz help

item.title: Help with a a few things
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

For Problem 3:

Search in client.java

public void levelup(int skill)

Scroll Down. Your probably going to see, playerHandler.messageToAll = “+playerName just got “+attack+” level up!”;

I don’t know what it says but some along those lines.

Now just put two slashes in front of it(Commenting out)

//playerHandler.messageToall = etc.

Problem 4:

It has to do with the interface Id and the frame your sending, it escapes me right now i think its 204 or something like that.

Problem 5:

Search:

public void youdied()

Scroll down…Till you see.

removeAllItems();

Press enter then tab TWICE. And add in there disconnected = false;

OR if theres a disconnected = true; comment it out by using //.

But disconnecting is normal, “It gives packets time to think”. Or sometimes you will appear “glitched” and people will see you walking through walls, when you really are not.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a a few things
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

First problem: Check teleto method.

Second Problem: Search:

//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime);

Under it add:

showInterface(3559);

Third Problem: Go to levelup method, comment out, where it says playerHandler.messageToALl = etc.

Fourth Problem: Again levelup method

Fifth Problem, Check the method youdied or applydead idk which one, i forget at the moment.

Read full topic
